title: murugan iNaiyaDi
sahitya:
murugan iNaiyaDi tuNai tanaip-peru manamE


anupallavi

  karuNaik-kunranaiya kATSi onru tarum tirupparam kunram tannil tigazhginra


caraNam    mAya valaiyil mATTi mati mayakkam UTTi pEi enap-piDittATTum tIya vinaiyai OTTi
tAi enap-parivuDan dayai peridum kATTi tUya neriyil nI ini nirkkat-tiran kUTTa
